semantic_event.name: VLAB_RESIZE
semantic_event.description: The virtual Lab is resized to a width of 780 and a height of 550.

semantic_event.name: WORKBENCH_ADD_FLASK
semantic_event.description: An empty 600mL Beaker (ID2) is added to the workbench.

semantic_event.name: SOLUTION_MIX
semantic_event.description: 100 mL from 250mL Erlenmeyer Flask (ID1) that contains Solution A (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of A; V=100 mL, T=298.15K) are poured into 600mL Beaker (ID2) that contains 600mL Beaker (; V=0 mL, T=298.15K). The resulting solution is 600mL Beaker (0E0g of H2O, 1E-7M of H+, 1E-7M of OH-, 1E0M of A; V=100 mL, T=298.15K).

semantic_event.name: WORKBENCH_MOVE_OBJECT
semantic_event.description: The following component/s: 600mL Beaker (ID2), is/are moved being the translation: 7,154.

semantic_event.name: WORKBENCH_FLASKS_CONNECT
semantic_event.description: The 250mL Erlenmeyer Flask (ID1) is connected to the 600mL Beaker (ID2).

semantic_event.name: FORM_CHECK
semantic_event.description: Correct checking of the student's answer in form lab(attempt 2). The submitted answer is 2 A 2 B --> 1 D. The correct value is 2 A 2 B --> 1 D. The system answers: Well done! You did a good job!.
